body_html:
1. Should we default to mode='center-left'? With center-left meaning that when one dimension is odd e.g. [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] we get [2, 3] where as mode=center-right would yield [3, 4].
  2. Does size accept arbitrary dimensions? If yes should we use my recusrive implementation in the former post?
body_text:
Should we default to mode='center-left'? With center-left meaning that when one dimension is odd e.g. [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] we get [2, 3] where as mode=center-right would yield [3, 4].
Does size accept arbitrary dimensions? If yes should we use my recusrive implementation in the former post?
body:
1. Should we default to `mode='center-left'`? With `center-left` meaning that when one dimension is odd e.g. `[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]` we get `[2, 3]` where as `mode=center-right` would yield `[3, 4]`.
2. Does `size` accept arbitrary dimensions? If yes should we use my recusrive implementation in the former post?
